creditline: Gift of funds from Darwin and Geri Reedy
description: deep, heavy mask pierced through the upper lip for cord suspension; covered overall with thin overlapping plates of copper fastened to the wood with copper nails; worn surface with areas of glossy patina
dimension: 11 1/8 x 7 5/8 x 7 in. (28.26 x 19.37 x 17.78 cm) (without mount)
inscription: \"FC9260\", in white, on back at PL edge
title: Mvondo Mask
